(Oops, forgot Dark One)
Dark One/Hiss:

::Dark One pulled his aside, the Alliance in the Sinai Desert in Egypt, right 
next to Israel::
"Hiss, I recieved a transmission from an unknown source.  He would like to 
hire our services for a blank protoform.  Send him back a message, saying we 
will send three people."

"Who are the three?"

"Breakdown, Hiss, and Pyro, Pyro you will fix up first."

"Very well, Dark One."
::Hiss began to make a laser beam communication, sending out a transmission 
that went as followed:

<Unknown employeer, we are currently busy, but will send three members of our 
team to help your comrade.  We do not know if that will be enough, or soon 
enough.  They should arrive in one mega-cycle.  Reply if that does not suit 
your needs>

::Dark One went up to Zardus::
"I believe we proved ourselves well.  So, for thirty lunar cycles (days) we 
will require a certain sum of energon.  Then at the end of that thirty 
period, we have the option of re-negotiating that contract or closing it.  We 
also hold the right to be employeed by other people, as long as it does not 
affect your team, as in we will not attack any of its members unless 
necessary, and we will not attack your base or any of your lands.  I trust 
you will find those terms acceptable."
